name: CVE-2022-31597
description: Within SAP S/4HANA - versions S4CORE 101, 102, 103, 104, 105, 106, SAPSCORE 127, the application business partner extension for Spain/Slovakia does not perform necessary authorization checks for a low privileged authenticated user over the network, resulting in escalation of privileges leading to low impact on confidentiality and integrity of the data.
pattern: [(software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:sap:s\\/4hana:101:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:sap:s\\/4hana:102:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:sap:s\\/4hana:103:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:sap:s\\/4hana:104:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:sap:s\\/4hana:105:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:sap:s\\/4hana:106:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:sap:sapscore:127:*:*:*:*:*:*:*')]

external_references.description: This object was created using cve2stix from the Signals Corps.
